name: get
description: httpq.get takes in the same parameters as Node.js's http.get, however, it accepts both http and https
returns: a promise that resolves to the body of the response encoded in utf-8

name: getRaw
description: same as httpq.get except the promise resolves to a Buffer
returns: a promise that resolves to a Buffer of the retrieved data.

name: post
description: httpq.post takes in the same parameters as Node.js's http.post, however, it accepts both http and https
returns: a promise that resolves to the body of the response encoded in utf-8

name: postRaw
description: same as httpq.post except the promise resolves to a Buffer
returns: a promise that resolves to a Buffer of the retrieved data.

name: request

parameters.name: reqFunc
parameters.description: a function that is passed the http.ClientRequest created by a call to http(s).request(...params)

returns: a promise that resolves to a Buffer containing the body of the response
